Description: In the twenty-fifth novel in the popular Xanth fantasies, six courageous adventurers--Cynthia Centaur, her mate Che, Breanna of the Black Wave and her human fiancT Justin Tree, Sim the immortal bird, and Jaylin, a human girl from Hawaii--embark on a dangerous quest to find the mystical Swell Foop, the only weapon that can prevail against a powerful Demon.
